product_name: The North Face Feather Lite Storm Blocker Jacket - Men's
long_description: Wear The North Face Feather Lite Storm Blocker men's jacket for windproof and waterproof coverage during long-distance runs, or compress and carry it for emergency protection. Ripstop polyester fabric stops water and wind with a HyVent waterproof breathable coating. The adjustable hood can be stowed away when not in use. Lightweight polyurethane pit zips enhance ventilation. Seam sealed; reflective logo; adjustable hem. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Feather Lite Storm Blocker jacket for men is part of the Flight Series(R) collection.
short_description: Wear The North Face Feather Lite Storm Blocker men's jacket for windproof and waterproof coverage during long-distance runs, or compress and carry it for emergency protection.
